statements: DELETE FROM performance_metrics WHERE client_id = 1 AND workout_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM performance_metrics WHERE calories_burned > 500 OR heart_rate < 100;
DELETE FROM WorkoutPlans WHERE plan_date = '2022-01-01' AND workout_type = 'Cardio';
DELETE FROM WorkoutPlans WHERE plan_date < '2022-09-01' AND workout_type = 'Cardio';
DELETE FROM progress_monitoring WHERE workout_date < '2023-01-01' AND performance_score < 7.5;
DELETE FROM Metrics WHERE client_id = 101 AND workout_id = 201;
DELETE FROM Clients WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'male';
DELETE FROM Clients WHERE name = 'John Doe';
